templates.name: Complete Social Media Proposal
templates.description: A comprehensive full-service social media marketing proposal with scope, team, rate card, and terms. Perfect for pitching monthly retainer services.

execSummary.summary: We are excited to present this comprehensive social media marketing proposal designed to elevate your brand's digital presence. Our team of experts will work closely with you to create engaging content, manage your community, and drive measurable results across all major social platforms.
execSummary.objectives:
• Build a strong, consistent brand presence across Instagram, LinkedIn, and Facebook
• Increase follower engagement by 40% within the first 6 months
• Drive qualified traffic to your website through organic content
• Establish thought leadership in your industry through strategic content
• Create a loyal community of brand advocates and customers

scope.name: Social Media Management
scope.description: Complete management of your social media presence including content strategy, scheduling, and community engagement across all major platforms.

scope.name: Content Creation & Design
scope.description: Professional graphic design and video editing services to create scroll-stopping content that aligns with your brand identity.

scope.name: Community Management
scope.description: Active community management to engage with your audience, respond to comments and messages, and build relationships.

clientResponsibilities: Provide brand guidelines, logos, and approved visual assets within 3 days of project kickoff
Approve content calendar at least 5 business days before the start of each month
Provide product/service information and updates for content creation
Assign a dedicated point of contact for approvals and queries with 24-hour response time
Share access to social media accounts and any relevant analytics data
outOfScope: Paid advertising media spend (ad budget to be provided separately)
Photography and video shooting (stock images and client-provided assets only)
Third-party software subscriptions (scheduling tools, analytics platforms)
Crisis management and PR services beyond standard community management
Website development or landing page creation

team.name: Social Media Strategist
team.description: Develops overall social media strategy, manages client relationships, oversees content direction, and ensures campaign objectives are met.

team.name: Content Designer
team.description: Creates all visual assets including graphics, carousels, stories, and assists with video editing. Ensures brand consistency across all content.

team.name: Community Manager
team.description: Monitors social channels daily, responds to comments and messages, engages with relevant accounts, and builds community relationships.

team.name: Copywriter
team.description: Writes compelling captions, articles, and social copy that resonates with the target audience and drives engagement.

templates.terms:
1. **Payment Terms**: 50% advance payment due upon project kickoff, remaining 50% due by the 5th of each month.

2. **Contract Duration**: Minimum 3-month commitment required. Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice.

3. **Content Approval**: All content will be shared for approval 5 business days before scheduled posting. Delays in approval may affect posting schedules.

4. **Revisions**: Each deliverable includes up to 2 rounds of revisions. Additional revisions will be billed at ₹1,500 per hour.

5. **Intellectual Property**: All created content becomes client's property upon full payment. Agency retains the right to showcase work in portfolio.

6. **Confidentiality**: Both parties agree to maintain confidentiality of proprietary information shared during the engagement.

7. **Limitation of Liability**: Agency's liability is limited to the monthly fee paid. We are not liable for platform algorithm changes or third-party service outages.

8. **Force Majeure**: Neither party is liable for delays caused by circumstances beyond reasonable control.

9. **Proposal Validity**: This proposal is valid for 30 days from the date of issue.

templates.name: Brand Identity Project
templates.description: A complete brand identity and visual design proposal including logo design, brand guidelines, collateral design, and digital assets.

execSummary.summary: This proposal outlines our comprehensive brand identity design services to create a distinctive and memorable brand presence for your business. From logo design to complete brand guidelines, we'll craft a cohesive visual identity that resonates with your target audience and sets you apart from competitors.
execSummary.objectives:
• Develop a unique and memorable brand identity that reflects your values
• Create consistent visual language across all touchpoints
• Design versatile logo variations for different applications
• Establish comprehensive brand guidelines for future use
• Deliver production-ready assets for immediate implementation

scope.name: Brand Discovery & Strategy
scope.description: In-depth research and strategy phase to understand your business, audience, competitors, and define brand direction.

scope.name: Logo Design & Visual Identity
scope.description: Complete logo design process including multiple concepts, revisions, and final deliverables in all required formats.

scope.name: Brand Collateral Design
scope.description: Design of essential brand collateral and touchpoints for immediate brand implementation.

scope.name: Brand Guidelines
scope.description: Comprehensive brand guidelines document ensuring consistent brand application across all future materials.

clientResponsibilities: Complete detailed brand questionnaire within 3 days of project start
Provide existing brand assets, if any, including previous logos and marketing materials
Attend brand discovery workshop (scheduled within first week)
Provide timely feedback on design concepts (within 5 business days per round)
Make timely payments according to the agreed milestone schedule
outOfScope: Photography or illustration services (stock assets used unless specified)
Printing and production of physical materials
Copywriting services beyond basic tagline development

team.name: Creative Director
team.description: Oversees creative direction, ensures brand strategy alignment, reviews all deliverables, and guides the design team.

team.name: Brand Designer
team.description: Primary designer responsible for logo concepts, visual identity development, and brand collateral design.

team.name: Brand Strategist
team.description: Conducts competitor research, leads discovery workshop, and develops brand strategy and positioning.

templates.terms:
1. **Payment Schedule**: 40% advance to commence work, 30% upon approval of logo concepts, 30% upon final delivery.

2. **Project Timeline**: 6-8 weeks from kickoff to final delivery, subject to timely client feedback.

3. **Revisions**: Each design phase includes specified revision rounds. Additional revisions beyond scope will be billed at ₹2,000 per hour.

4. **Intellectual Property**: Full ownership rights transfer to client upon final payment. Designer retains right to display work in portfolio.

5. **Source Files**: Source files (AI, PSD, Figma) delivered upon final payment.

6. **Project Scope**: Any additions to the agreed scope will require a separate change order and additional fees.

7. **Project Pauses**: Projects paused for more than 14 days may be subject to rescheduling fees.

8. **Confidentiality**: All client information and materials are treated as strictly confidential.

9. **Proposal Validity**: This proposal is valid for 21 days from the date of issue.

templates.name: Standard Terms & Conditions
templates.description: A comprehensive terms and conditions template suitable for digital marketing and creative service agreements.
templates.terms:
1. **Payment Terms**: 50% advance payment due upon project kickoff, remaining 50% due by the 5th of each month for retainer services or upon milestone completion for project-based work. Late payments subject to 2% monthly service charge.

2. **Contract Duration**: Retainer agreements require a minimum 3-month commitment. Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice. Project-based work follows the timeline specified in the proposal.

3. **Work Schedule**: Standard business days are Monday-Friday, 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM IST. Weekend and holiday work available at premium rates (1.5x standard rates).

4. **Content Approval Process**: All content will be shared for approval as per the agreed timeline. Delays in approval beyond 48 hours may result in rescheduled delivery dates.

5. **Revisions Policy**: Each deliverable includes up to 2 rounds of revisions unless otherwise specified. Additional revisions will be billed at ₹1,500 per hour. Major scope changes require a change order.

6. **Intellectual Property Rights**: All created content, designs, and materials become client's property upon full payment. Agency retains the right to showcase work in portfolio and marketing materials unless otherwise agreed in writing.

7. **Confidentiality Agreement**: Both parties agree to maintain strict confidentiality regarding proprietary information, business strategies, and sensitive data shared during the engagement period and thereafter.

8. **Third-Party Services**: Client is responsible for direct payment of third-party costs including media spend, software subscriptions, stock image licenses, and printing costs unless explicitly included in the proposal.

9. **Limitation of Liability**: Agency's liability is limited to the fees paid for services. We are not liable for platform algorithm changes, third-party service outages, or indirect damages.

10. **Force Majeure**: Neither party is liable for delays caused by circumstances beyond reasonable control including natural disasters, government actions, or internet service disruptions.

11. **Indemnification**: Client agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the agency from claims arising from content provided by client or unauthorized use of deliverables.

12. **Proposal Validity**: This proposal is valid for 30 days from the date of issue unless otherwise specified. Pricing and availability subject to change after expiration.
